name: Heyy Life
description: heyy is a mental healthcare startup tackling low adoption, continuity, and efficacy. Our human-in-loop approach with therapists boasts a 10x higher adoption rate and a #1 ranking in India & US app stores.  heyy offers self-care tools, personalized mini-therapy pathways, and a culturally-sensitive first-aid model backed by research. With over 200,000 users and VC funding, heyy is making mental wellness accessible and effective.
Headline: Driving Employee Performance through Therapy and Coaching
ShortDescription: Empowering managers to craft high performing & supportive team cultures

Highlights.name: Top-Ranked App
Highlights.description: Ranked #1 for mental health in India & US app stores, demonstrating user satisfaction and strong brand recognition.

Highlights.name: Cost-Effective Marketing
Highlights.description: Leveraged App Store Optimization (ASO) as a key driver for user acquisition, achieving low customer acquisition cost (CAC).

Highlights.name: Data-Driven Innovation
Highlights.description: Partnered with a leading university (Christ University) to validate their First-Aid model, showcasing commitment to research and evidence-based practices.

enhanced_description: Heyy Life is a mental healthcare startup focused on addressing common challenges like low adoption, continuity, and efficacy in mental wellness programs. Leveraging a unique human-in-loop approach that incorporates therapists, heyy boasts a 10x higher adoption rate and has achieved a #1 ranking in mental health categories in both India and US app stores. The platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools, including self-care resources, personalized mini-therapy pathways, and a culturally-sensitive first-aid model that has been validated by research, including a partnership with Christ University. With over 200,000 users and backed by VC funding, heyy is dedicated to making mental wellness accessible and effective for organizations globally. It aims to improve employee happiness and engagement, drive employee performance through therapy and coaching, and empower managers to cultivate high-performing and supportive team cultures.
key_use_cases: Providing accessible and effective mental health support to employees
Enhancing employee performance through therapy and coaching
Empowering managers to build supportive and high-performing team cultures
Offering self-care tools and personalized mini-therapy pathways
Implementing culturally-sensitive mental health first-aid models
competitive_advantages: Human-in-Loop Model with therapists leading to 10x higher adoption rates
Ranked #1 for mental health in India & US app stores, demonstrating strong user satisfaction and brand recognition
Culturally-sensitive first-aid model backed by academic research and validation (e.g., Christ University partnership)
Data-driven user journey optimization for personalized and effective support
Achieved low customer acquisition cost (CAC) through App Store Optimization (ASO), suggesting efficient scalability and value
hr_functions_supported: Performance Management (indirectly, through mental health support)
roi_benefits: Increased adoption and utilization of mental health support programs (10x higher adoption rate)
Improved employee happiness and engagement, potentially leading to increased productivity and retention
Enhanced employee performance through targeted therapy and coaching interventions
Cultivation of more supportive and high-performing team cultures
primary_users: Employees (as end-users of mental health services)
